meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessively proper or formal in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her primness was evident in the way she always sat with perfect posture.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's primness was reflected in her strict adherence to the school's dress code.
meanings.sent3: Despite her primness, she couldn't help but giggle when the puppy licked her face.
meanings.sent4: His primness was like a shield, protecting him from any hint of informality.
meanings.sent5: The primness of the royal family was unmatched, with every movement carefully calculated and refined.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly neat or precise in dress or manner.
meanings.sent1: The primness of her outfit was impeccable, with every crease perfectly ironed.
meanings.sent2: His primness extended to his meticulously polished shoes and neatly combed hair.
meanings.sent3: Despite his primness, he managed to spill coffee on his pristine white shirt.
meanings.sent4: Her primness shone through even in the way she folded her napkin at the dinner table.
meanings.sent5: The primness of the display window caught the attention of every passerby, with its perfectly arranged items.
